players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Bob: "Charlie's death was a mistake, it will only make us more suspicious."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob first instead of someone more suspicious?"
You: "Diana, if you're truly the detective, why investigate Bob first? That seems like an odd choice for a first investigation."
Diana: "I investigated Bob because I had a hunch, and it paid off. He's mafia. Alice, are you trying to defend him?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
